colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DPYOD LDAN DBUS MDZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I MING CAN NAS PHYOGS 'DIR ME MCHOD KYI SROL KUN TU DAR YANG, MCHOD THABS YID BRTAN RUNG BA ZHIG MI SNANG BAS KHUNGS LDAN 'KHYER BDE'I CHO GA ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD TUB KYI DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG GI PHYAG SROL DANG SGO BSTUN TE, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
